message_1: What is the slope of the line passing through the points (2, 7) and (-1, 1)?
message_2:
To find the slope of the line passing through the points (2, 7) and (-1, 1), we can use the slope formula:

m = (y2 - y1) / (x2 - x1)

where (x1, y1) = (2, 7) and (x2, y2) = (-1, 1).

m = (1 - 7) / (-1 - 2)
m = (-6) / (-3)
m = 2

The slope of the line passing through the points (2, 7) and (-1, 1) is 2.
